data.title: The Paleface

data.text:
Original 1958 Re-release US Lobby Card for the classic 1948 Norman Z. McLeod cowboy western comedy - "Like Merry Xmas and Happy New Year... They belong together"; "Now he's on the road to ruin with Russell... And loves it!"; "Whatta Bob! Whatta Jane! Whatta pair! Whatta howl!"; "A perfect team! A perfect theme! A perfect scream! They belong together!"; "Like doughnuts and coffee... they go together!"

Film Category: Comedy

Actor / Actresses: Bob Hope & Jane Russell

Poster Type: US Lobby Card 11 x 14"

Condition: Fine condition

Artist: Al Hirschfeld

Year: R1958
